description:
Allows creating acceptance tests in developer friendly environment.

Features:
* Native support for refactoring, code analysis (like finding unused methods), test running and all features that Visual Studio / Intellisense / Resharper offers during code development,
* Easy to read scenario definitions,
* Scenario steps execution tracking, usable during longer test execution,
* Feature result summary available in XML or Plain text format,
* VS Project Item templates for feature test files,
* Integrated with NUnit and MbUnit frameworks.
releaseNotes:
+ extracted NUnit related code to LightBDD.NUnit
+ introduced LightBDD.MbUnit to add support for MbUnit framework
+ made runner thread safe which allows to use Runner.RunScenario() in parallel
+ added FeatureDescription attribute which can be used to describe feature class no matter which testing framework is used
summary: Core assemblies for Lightweight Behavior Driven Development Test Framework (LightBDD) allowing creation of acceptance tests in developer friendly environment.
title: LightBDD.Core
